settings.custom_liquid: L.A. Girl will be closed from December 23, 2024, to January 1, 2025, in observance of the holidays. Any orders placed after 9:30 AM PST on Friday, December 20, 2024, will be processed starting Thursday, January 2, 2025. Please note that credit cards will be charged for orders placed during the closure period

settings.success_message: Thank you for contacting us. We'll get back to you within 2 business days.
settings.faq_description: Find the answer to your questions.
settings.form_description: We will love to hear from you! Just complete the form below and we'll get back to you within 2 business days.
